creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Mrs Justin Dart
description: cluster of bamboo leaves at LRQ with several tall bamboo stalks along L edge; calligraphy across top and down R side
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, Marks, Seals, and Sticker

top and along R side
markings:
across top when rolled, Japanese inscription and label; on back over roller: Japanese label; on back, LLC over roller in pen: various; seals: ULC of image, square relief; LL edge of image, square intaglio; back L over roller, rectangular intaglio; on top when rolled: rectangular relief; and large square relief on back when rolled; sticker L roller end: [Kaiseki]

red seal; 矮梅??
title: Bamboo and Poem
